author: Simon Difford
description: Delicate, fragrant fruity notes from freshly squeezed tangerine/mandarin juice freshen this version of the classic Bronx. My recipe for both versions of the Bronx are the same, it's just the use of tangerine/mandarin/clementine orange juice that denotes this "Improved".
name: Improved Bronx
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Tangerine / Mandarin / Clementine juice (fresh juice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
